issue.title: instruction times should be quantised to the pseudoclock clock_resolution

content.raw:
fixes issue #40

* We now quantise all times to multiples of the pseudoclock clock_resolution.
* changed some error messages to report times, and to report the times to more significant figures so it is easy to see if the discrepancy comes from floating point rounding error)
* Added a method to `Device` which allows you to quantise times based on the clock_resolution of the parent pseudoclock device.
